docs.title: Overview
docs.text: KMP-RWMutex is a lightweight Kotlin Multiplatform read-write mutex implementation based on Golang's sync.RWMutex.

docs.title: Setup (Gradle)
docs.text:
Kotlin DSL:

repositories {
    mavenCentral()

    // Add only if you're using snapshot version
    maven("https://s01.oss.sonatype.org/content/repositories/snapshots/")
}

dependencies {
    implementation("com.mayakapps.rwmutex:rwmutex:1.0.0-SNAPSHOT")
}

Groovy DSL:

repositories {
    mavenCentral()

    // Add only if you're using snapshot version
    maven { url "https://s01.oss.sonatype.org/content/repositories/snapshots/" }
}

dependencies {
    implementation "com.mayakapps.rwmutex:rwmutex:1.0.0-SNAPSHOT"
}

docs.title: Contributing
docs.text: All contributions are welcome. If you are reporting an issue, please use the provided template. If you're planning to contribute to the code, please open an issue first describing what feature you're planning to add or what issue you're planning to fix. This allows better discussion and coordination of efforts. You can also check open issues for bugs/features that needs to be fixed/implemented.
